publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3335 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2002-That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic) Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2002, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S1M-3335 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2002-That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic) Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2002, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety, Mrs Mary Mulligan
